column1: Little Goat Diner////Our Waitress was amazing! We asked her which items were her favorite on the menu and all of them were on point! I ordered the Tonkatsu sandwich and loved it. The sandwich had a breaded pork cutlet
column4: cabbage on white bread. The mayo and bbq complimented each other really well and mixed with the cabbage
column5: each bite i took was absolutely delicious. I would definitely recommend. One thing to note is that this sandwich comes alone. if you order a side of fries
column6: I think it is large enough to share
